oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nashville Music Festival & 2nd Annual Fiddlers Convention (19045)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jones, Ramona; McCoy, Charlie, 1941-; Brown, Hylo; Hartford, John; Montgomery, Melba; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on green) announcing the Nashville Music Festival and 2nd Annual Fiddler's Convention with Ramona Jones and Harold Morrison on August 26, Charlie McCoy and Hylo Brown on August 27, John Hartford, Melba Montgomery, and Jamey Ryan on August 28 at the Pinewood Valley Ranch. Poster features metal photoplates of Ramona Jones, Harold Morrison, Charlie McCoy, Hylo Brown, John Hartford, and Melba Montgomery. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20551.
